DOC.brief_title: Does NMES Help Relieve Lower Limb Oedema Improve Joint Mobility Skin Tissue Oxygenation Levels ?
DOC.detailed_description: Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) facilitate use two-channel , research stimulator , patient semi recumbent position , use UltraStim electrode . Two 5 cm x 5 cm electrode place soleus muscle calf stimulation . The participant allow ramp stimulus level get use sensation determine maximum tolerate stimulus level . A goniometer use assess mobility knee ankle joint . Transcutaneous oxygen measurement ( tcpO2 ) assess use PERIMED Periflux System 500 tcpO2 monitor . The level oedema measure use figure eight measurement , tape circumference measurement water displacement measurement . Comfort also assess use 100mm non-hatched visual analogue scale ( VAS ) . Each participant ask indicate level comfort follow application NMES . VAS pain score 30 mm less categorised mild pain , 31 69 mm moderate pain , score 70 mm great severe pain .
